TopicTitle: The best rendezvous tutorial I've ever seen

Articles.Content: It's better than what I normally use and I've been playing since .23, so I think this will help out a lot of people:

In my experience, the best rendezvous/docking tutorial is the ingame one in the training section. I watched countless videos on the subject and none of them helped, but when I did the ingame one something finally clicked.

Yep. That video finally did the trick. Thanks for posting this! The thing that I kept forgetting/not-realizing is that Target/Orbit mode have differnet

prograde/retrograde markers. Ha... that really explains some frustrating attempts!
